title: Importar keystore de Wanchain
head: Importar keystore de Wanchain
warning: ALERTA: Cuenta de keystore no recomendado como acceso. No se admite backup del keystore. Protege su keystore original o transfiere sus activos a la cuenta HD o hardware (ej. Trezor, Ledger).
enterKfPw: Input Keystore Password (This is your old wallet password)
enterWwPw: Input WAN Wallet Password (This is your new wallet password)
ERR_NOT_FOUND: No se puede continuar, la cartera no esta creada o esta bloqueada.
ERR_DUPLICATE_KEYFILE: No vuelva a importar el mismo archivo de clave
TEXT_SUCCESS: La importacion se realizo correctamente. Esta ventana cerrara en 5 segundos.
confirm_noticeText:
Be sure to make a backup of the Keystore file, this is the only way to restore your account assets, because the mnemonic on the light wallet is unable to help you restore the corresponding Keystore account address. 
 e also recommend that you transfer all the assets of the Keystore account directly to the new address of the light wallet, and discard the Keystore and the corresponding account address.
